OOC: Those are clear rule violations. On part of the council I make the post(s) that Cardhead has reported void.

cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:OOC: Whoever's controlling Sideways, cut out the moding.  Until I've 
had a chance to respond (ie wait until you've been answered before 
going ahead), you have no right to simply waltz past my characters - 
or anyone else's for that matter.  Not to mention the fact that you 
ignored shields and blasted open the base with no effort, and 
intercepted weapons fire with your own shots - also blatant rules 
violations.  Beyond that, it's also illegal to post damage (or even 
being hit) for someone else's character, as you did for Perceptor.  
Honestly, does NOBODY read the damn rules these days?

Pumpskin::

"Not so fast!" Pumpskin cackles as all eight of his beast form's 
tentacles reach out to ensnare Sideways, using the narrow hallway to 
his advantage.  Where they had been short, seconds ago, they now 
extend greatly in length until the intruder is surrounded in all 
directions by green.  "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHA!!!!"
